{
    "title": "Titanic",
    "description": "A romantic drama film about the ill-fated maiden voyage of the R.M.S. Titanic, which struck an iceberg and sank on its maiden voyage.",
    "genres": ["Romance", "Drama"],
    "popularity": 87.5,
    "voteAverage": 8.5,
    "voteCount": 12000
}

{
    "title": "The Green Mile",
    "description": "A supernatural drama film about a death row corrections officer who discovers that an inmate possesses a miraculous healing power.",
    "genres": ["Drama", "Fantasy"],
    "popularity": 79.2,
    "voteAverage": 8.9,
    "voteCount": 10500
}

{
    "title": "Avengers: Civil War",
    "description": "A superhero film depicting the internal conflict among the Avengers as they disagree over government oversight and accountability.",
    "genres": ["Action", "Adventure", "Sci-Fi"],
    "popularity": 92.5,
    "voteAverage": 9.1,
    "voteCount": 15000
}

{
    "title": "Rambo",
    "description": "An action film following the iconic character John Rambo as he embarks on a mission to rescue hostages in a war-torn region.",
    "genres": ["Action", "Thriller"],
    "popularity": 74.8,
    "voteAverage": 7.8,
    "voteCount": 8500
}

{
    "title": "Eerie Shadows",
    "description": "A chilling horror film set in a haunted mansion, where unsuspecting individuals must confront their deepest fears as malevolent forces from the supernatural realm come to life.",
    "genres": ["Horror", "Mystery"],
    "popularity": 79.4,
    "voteAverage": 7.7,
    "voteCount": 8100
}

{
    "title": "Laugh Out Loud",
    "description": "A comedy film that follows the hilarious misadventures of a group of friends on a road trip to a comedy festival, bringing laughter and unexpected twists.",
    "genres": ["Comedy"],

}
